channel.title: Snubs
channel.description: Film nerds and hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films snubbed at the Oscars. Alternating each week, one host must convince the other of their favorite films' deserved nomination. They discuss Oscar films and their competitive awards years, while also trying to make each other laugh.
channel.itunes:author: High Tops Media & Caroline Young, Chris Masciarelli

item.title: Oscars 2022 Recap
item.description:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, are joined by special guest Ana Tressel to recap the 2022 Oscars and the slap everyone can’t stop talking about. They also discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Academy this year, and where they’d make some changes. Chris’s allergies make him sound like he’s been chain smoking for 80 years, Caroline can’t believe the 3 hour Japanese Best Picture nominee was watched without her, and Ana wants Emma Stone and Andrew Garfield to get back together.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: Avengers: Endgame
item.description:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Marvel’s Avengers: Endgame and the 2020 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Chris had the best theater experience of his life seeing this movie, and Caroline tries (and fails) to not sound like a pretentious film bro again.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

item.title: Zodiac
item.description:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss David Fincher’s Zodiac and the 2008 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline wants David Fincher to make serial killer movies until the end of time, and Chris probably wrote the Zodiac letters (but don’t tell anyone).

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

item.title: The American President
item.description:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Rob Reiner and Aaron Sorkin’s The American President and the 1996 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Chris wants the Aaron Sorkin to know he should definitely consider writing a Spider-Man movie, and Caroline is a newfound member of the Paul Dano fan club, the Danosaurs.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

item.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
item.description:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Alfonso Cuarón’s Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban and the 2005 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline wants the audience to know Harry Potter was her first love, and Chris would rather talk about the 2007 Amy Adams movie, Enchanted.

item.title: Jurassic Park
item.description:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Steven Spielberg’s Jurassic Park and the 1994 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline wants the audience to know she fricken’ loves dinosaurs, and Chris won’t stop talking about Steve Martin movies.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
